description: Provides portrait image information for an entity, used for UI display in the 'Current Turn' panel and potentially elsewhere.

dataSchema.title: Core: Portrait Component Data
dataSchema.description: Defines the data structure for portrait information an entity possesses.

imagePath.description: Relative path to the portrait image within this mod's directory structure (e.g., 'portraits/hero.png' or 'images/avatars/player_character.webp').

altText.description: Alternative text for the image, crucial for accessibility. If not provided, the entity's name can be used as a fallback by the UI.
